mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, c.* FROM (SELECT * FROM conninformation ORDER BY conn_time DESC, mem_id) c) WHERE rnum BETWEEN (${pageVO.page}*${pageVO.pageSize})-(${pageVO.pageSize}-1) AND ${pageVO.page}*${pageVO.pageSize}

SELECT connstat_date AS conn_time, brow_firefox, brow_mise, brow_chrome, brow_opera, brow_others
SELECT connstat_date AS conn_time, divice_mobile, divice_tablet, divice_pc, divice_others
SELECT connstat_date AS conn_time, referer_email, referer_blog, referer_sns, referer_others
SELECT connstat_date AS conn_time, os_android, os_ios, os_windows10, os_windowsxp, os_windowsothers, os_linux, os_macintosh, os_others
FROM connstat WHERE connstat_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start}, 'yyyy.MM.dd') AND TO_DATE(#{end} || '23:59:59', 'yyyy.MM.dd HH24:MI:SS')
